Edges in the Rectangle are
10 10 20 10 
15 10 40 10 
15 15 20 15 
15 25 40 25 
10 30 20 30 
15 30 20 30 
10 10 10 30 
15 10 15 25 
15 15 15 30 
20 10 20 30 
20 15 20 30 
40 10 40 25 

Measure is 500
Perimeter is 100

Contour Edges are 
10 10 40 10 
20 25 40 25 
10 30 20 30 
10 10 10 30 
20 25 20 30 
40 10 40 25
